name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Experienced in **Azure DevOps** with hands-on skills in **Pipelines**, **Artifacts**, **Boards**, **Test Plans**, and **Repos**, I am a skilled Full Stack Developer with 8 years of experience shifting towards a Senior DevOps Engineer role. My technical repertoire includes security analysis tools like **Fortify**, **Snyk**, and **Venafi**, ensuring robust permission management and integration of secure software deployment practices. I am proficient in leveraging **data lake** architectures to enhance data-driven decision-making processes.
In my full-stack development journey, I have utilized technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** across various high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. My expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** complements my background in cloud environments like **Azure** and **AWS**.
I am adept at leading enterprise-grade platforms with integrated AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing. My foundational knowledge in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation underpins my commitment to developing strong, compliant applications that meet standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. I also possess hands-on experience in MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
